actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to waive temporarily the medicare enrollment composition rules for The Wellness Plan.

summary.text: Waives, with respect to Comprehensive Health Services, Inc. (doing business as The Wellness Plan) for contract periods through December 31, 2000, the (50-50) requirement under the Social Security Act (SSA) that each eligible organization with which the Secretary of Health and Human Services contracts under Medicare have, for the duration of the contract, an enrolled membership at least one-half of which consists of individuals who are not entitled to Medicare or Medicaid benefits under SSA titles XVIII and XIX, respectively.

titles.title: A bill to waive temporarily the medicare enrollment composition rules for The Wellness Plan.
